description:
Want to Take Photos Like a Pro with your Nikon D3000? The Answer Will Now Be on your TouchPad

With TouchPad Camera Guides from QuickPro, you'll never have to miss the shot of your life again. Whether it’s that birthday surprise, graduation ceremony, or your daughters' wedding day, the ability to take a photo like a Pro is within reach.  It's literally in your pocket.

QuickPro Camera Guides, the leading producer of Camera Guide tutorials, announces Nikon D3000 Advanced. Now you have ready to go instruction of all camera functions where you need it and when you need it. Really want to capture the Colosseum and Pantheon on your trip to Rome? Take along your TouchPad and, while you're on the plane, enjoy a Pro training session with a QuickPro Camera Guide specialist.

Provides:
- Instructional video on all aspects of the Nikon D3000 and photography.
- On the go video playback. No WIFI required after initial install for watching in the field.
- Interactive search to find information on particular camera features.

Advanced Subjects Include:
- Camera Parts Overview
- Memory Cards & Image Storage
- Megapixels & Image Size
- Elements of Proper Exposure
- Aperture
- Shutter Speed
- ISO
- Exposure Metering
- Metering Modes
- Program Auto Mode
- When to use Program Auto Mode
- Aperture Priority Mode
- When to use Aperture Priority
- Shutter Priority Mode
- When to use Shutter Priority
- Manual Mode
- When to use Manual Mode
- Focus Areas
- Different AF Areas
- Focus Modes
- Different AF modes
- White Balance
- White Balance Presets
- Custom White Balance
- Built in Flash Modes
- Choose a Flash Mode

This training content was produced by QuickPro, LLC. This product is not sponsored by Nikon, Corp. or its subsidiaries. Nikon Product Names and terminology are trademarks of Nikon, Corp.
